title: Supply Chain Consignment
description: A separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee in a supply chain via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.

totalChargeAmount.title: Total Charge Amount.
totalChargeAmount.description: Freight Amount. The total monetary value of all freight and other service charges for this supply chain consignment.

cargoInsuranceProvidedByCTO.title: Cargo Insurance Provided By CTO.
cargoInsuranceProvidedByCTO.description: Cargo Insurance through the undersigned. The indication of whether or not this supply chain consignment has a nil value for insurance.

insurancePolicyNumber.title: Cargo Insurance Policy Number
insurancePolicyNumber.description: If this supply chain consignment is insured, this field contains the policy number.

insurancePolicyCompany.title: Cargo Insurance Company
insurancePolicyCompany.description: If this supply chain consignment is insured, this field contains the name of the insurance company issuing the policy.

numberOfPackages.title: Number Of Packages
numberOfPackages.description: The number of packages within this supply chain consignment.

declaredValueForCarriageAmount.title: Declared Value For Carriage Amount
declaredValueForCarriageAmount.description: Declared value for ad valorem rate according to the declaration of the consignor. The monetary value of this supply chain consignment as declared by the shipper or his agent for the purpose of varying the carrier's level of liability from that provided in the contract of carriage, in case of loss or damage to goods or delayed delivery.

consignor.title: Consignor
consignor.description: Consignor. The consignor party for this supply chain consignment.

consignee.title: Consignee
consignee.description: Consigned to order of. The consignee party for this supply chain consignment.

ctoAgent.title: CTO Agent
ctoAgent.description: For delivery of goods please apply to. The party acting as the agent of the carrier for this supply chain consignment.

cto.title: Combined Transport Operator (CTO)
cto.description: The carrier party for this supply chain consignment.

notifiedParty.title: Notified Party
notifiedParty.description: Notify address. A party who has been or will be notified about this supply chain consignment.

carrierAcceptanceLocation.title: Carrier Acceptance Location
carrierAcceptanceLocation.description: Place of delivery. The location where this supply chain consignment will be, or has been, accepted by the carrier.

consigneeReceiptLocation.title: Consignee Receipt Location
consigneeReceiptLocation.description: Place of receipt. The location at which this supply chain consignment will be or has been received by the consignee.

loadingBaseportLocation.title: Loading Baseport Location
loadingBaseportLocation.description: Port of loading. The baseport location at which this supply chain consignment is to be loaded on a means of transport according to the transport contract.

unloadingBaseportLocation.title: Unloading Baseport Location
unloadingBaseportLocation.description: Port of discharge. The baseport location at which this supply chain consignment is to be unloaded from a means of transport according to the transport contract.

includedConsignmentItem.title: Include Consignment Item
includedConsignmentItem.description: A consignment item included in this supply chain consignment.

mainCarriageTransportMovement.title: Main Carriage Transport Movement
mainCarriageTransportMovement.description: A main carriage logistics transport movement for this supply chain consignment.

applicableServiceCharge.title: Applicable Service Charge
applicableServiceCharge.description: Freight payable at. A logistics service charge applicable to this supply chain consignment, such as freight or insurance charges.

id.title: ID
id.description: A unique identifier of this trade party.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name, expressed as text, for this trade party.

languageCode.title: Language Code
languageCode.description: A code specifying a language for this trade party.

definedContactDetails.title: Defined Contact Details
definedContactDetails.description: A trade contact defined for this trade party.

postalAddress.title: Postal Address
postalAddress.description: The postal address for this trade party.

taxRegistration.title: Tax Registration
taxRegistration.description: A tax registration specified for this trade party.

governmentRegistration.title: Government Registration
governmentRegistration.description: A governmental registration specified for this trade party.

mobileTelephone.description: The mobile telephone communication information for this trade contact.

emailAddress.description: The email URI communication information for this trade contact.

note.title: Note
note.description: A note specified for this trade contact.

id.title: ID
id.description: A unique identifier of this trade address.

postcode.title: Postcode
postcode.description: A code specifying the postcode of this trade address.

streetName.title: Street Name
streetName.description: A name, expressed as text, of a street or thoroughfare for this trade address.

cityName.title: City Name
cityName.description: The name, expressed as text, of the city, town or village of this trade address.

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: The unique identifier of a country for this trade address.

countryName.title: Country Name
countryName.description: A name, expressed as text, of the country for this trade address.

countrySubDivisionName.title: Country Sub-division Name
countrySubDivisionName.description: A name, expressed as text, of the sub-division of a country for this trade address.

consignmentItem.description: A consignment item included in this supply chain consignment.

goodsTypeCode.title: Goods Type Code
goodsTypeCode.description: Description of goods. The code specifying the type of supply chain consignment item.

declaredValueForCarriageAmount.title: Declared Value For Carriage Amount
declaredValueForCarriageAmount.description: Declared value for ad valorem reate according to the declaration of the consignor. The monetary value of this supply chain consignment item as declared by the shipper or his agent for the purpose of varying the carrier's level of liability from that provided in the contract of carriage, in case of loss or damage to goods or delayed delivery.

insuranceValueAmount.title: Insurance Value Amount
insuranceValueAmount.description: The monetary value of this supply chain consignment item as covered by an insurance policy.

grossWeight.title: Gross Weight
grossWeight.description: Gross weight. A measure of the gross weight (mass) of this supply chain consignment item which includes packaging but excludes any transport equipment.

grossVolume.title: Gross Volume
grossVolume.description: Measurement. A measure of the gross volume, normally calculated by multiplying the maximum length, width and height of this supply chain consignment item.

cargoNatureIdentification.title: Cargo Nature Identification
cargoNatureIdentification.description: Description of goods. Transport cargo details of this supply chain consignment item sufficient to identify its nature for customs, statistical or transport purposes.

transportDangerousGoods.title: Transport Dangerous Goods
transportDangerousGoods.description: Description of goods. Dangerous goods transport details applicable to this supply chain consignment item.

associatedTransportEquipment.title: Associated Transport Equipment
associatedTransportEquipment.description: Marks and Numbers. A referenced piece of transport equipment associated with this supply chain consignment item.

transportPackage.title: Transport Package
transportPackage.description: Number and kind of packages. A transport package for this supply chain consignment item.

usedTransportEquipment.title: Associated Transport Equipment
usedTransportEquipment.description: A referenced piece of transport equipment associated with this supply chain consignment item.

transportCargo.description: Transport cargo details of this supply chain consignment item sufficient to identify its nature for customs, statistical or transport purposes.

typeCode.title: Type Code
typeCode.description: The code, such as UNECE Recommendation 21 single digit codes, specifying the type of transported cargo.

identificationText.title: Identification Text
identificationText.description: Identification, expressed as text, of this transport cargo that is sufficient to identify it for customs, statistical or transport purposes.

transportDangerousCode.description: Dangerous goods transport details applicable to this supply chain consignment item.

undgId.title: UNDG ID
undgId.description: The code specifying the unique United Nations Dangerous Goods (UNDG) number assigned to these transported dangerous goods.

hazardClassificationId.title: Hazard Classification ID
hazardClassificationId.description: The unique identifier of a hazard class applicable to these transported dangerous goods as defined by the relevant governing regulation authority.

logisticsPackage.description: A transport package for this supply chain consignment item.

itemQuantity.title: Item Quantity
itemQuantity.description: The number of logistics packages at this level.

typeCode.title: Type Code
typeCode.description: A code specifying the type of logistics package.

typeText.title: Type Text
typeText.description: A type, expressed as text, of this logistics package.

shippingMarks.title: Shipping Marks
shippingMarks.description: Physical shipping marks and barcode information for this logistics package.

logisticsTransportMeans.title: Logistics Transport Means
logisticsTransportMeans.description: The means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.

typeCode.title: Type Code
typeCode.description: The code specifying the type of logistics means of transport (Reference UNECE Recommendation 28).

typeText.title: Type Text
typeText.description: The type, expressed as text, of this logistics means of transport.

id.title: ID
id.description: An identifier of this logistics means of transport, such as the International Maritime Organization number of a vessel.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name, expressed as text, of this logistics means of transport.

voyageNumber.title: Voyage Number
voyageNumber.description: The unique identifier for this logistics transport movement, such as voyage number, flight number, or trip number

serviceCharge.title: Payment Place
serviceCharge.description: The location of the place of payment of this logistics service charge.

paymentArrangementCode.title: Payment Arrangement Code
paymentArrangementCode.description: The code specifying the payment arrangement for this logistics service charge [Reference United Nations Code List (UNCL) 4237]. See https://service.unece.org/trade/untdid/d04b/tred/tred4237.htm

paymentPlace.title: Payment Place
paymentPlace.description: The location of the place of payment of this logistics service charge.

transportEquipment.description: Logistics transport equipment utilized for this supply chain consignment.

affixedSeal.description: A seal affixed to this piece of logistics transport equipment.
